question: I just had my second biopsy today for  a nodule.  The first one  was 2 weeks ago but the said they did not get enough tissue. The biopsy today, they do not think the got enough today . ONE of the doctors said it could be a cyst and it was located in a small space between  arteries.  I do not want to go thru another biospy.  What do you suggest. I  am really scared to death that this could be cancer. Thank youfor your thoughts  PamThis discussion is related to/posts/Diabetes/FNA-unsuccessful--thyroid-nodule/show/476670.
title: thyroid nodule
